des: "Many people are unable to find true Roquefort* dressing. This recipe is as close to it as possible. Mix well if you like a smoother dressing. Some may want more bleu than I have suggested."
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together cream cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, garlic, and salt and pepper. Mix in lemon juice and milk, stirring until smooth. Crumble blue cheese into mixture, and fold into mix, without breaking up chunks.
